meanings.definition: A person who is not engaged in a specific profession or occupation.
meanings.sent1: At the event, the nonprofessionals outnumbered the experts.
meanings.sent2: The company hired nonprofessionals to help with the project.
meanings.sent3: The nonprofessionals tried to fix the broken machine with duct tape.
meanings.sent4: In a world of doctors and lawyers, she stood out as a nonprofessional artist.
meanings.sent5: The nonprofessionals brought a fresh perspective to the problem-solving process.

meanings.definition: Not belonging to or characteristic of a profession.
meanings.sent1: The nonprofessional approach to the task was refreshing.
meanings.sent2: Her nonprofessional attire raised eyebrows at the formal event.
meanings.sent3: The nonprofessional chef accidentally added sugar instead of salt to the dish.
meanings.sent4: His nonprofessional behavior in the meeting was unprofessional.
meanings.sent5: The nonprofessional quality of the painting gave it a unique charm.
